document_data.name: Tanyl Evanara
document_data.mainbody: '''Tanyl Evanara''' was an [[elf|elven]] chief war wizard of the [[Tower of the Sun]] on [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Description: Tanyl was tall and thin even by elven standards.
document_data.Personality: Dedicated to the defense of the island, Tanyl specialized in the development of new spells particularly of a military nature.
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Tanyl wore enchanted mail and a helmet in the shape of a [[dragon]]. He wielded the [[sword]] ''[[Tanduras]]'' which had the ability to steal life from [[evil]] creatures and wore a ''[[ring of spell turning]]''.
